description: Hover or focus content should be dismissible and persistent while needed.
recommendation: Ensure hover or focus content can be dismissed and remains visible for users. (WCAG 2.1 SC 1.4.13)
algorithm: Detects CSS :hover/:focus rules that toggle display/visibility/opacity, indicating hover-revealed content.
algorithm_advanced: Regex-scans CSS for :hover/:focus rules that change display/visibility/opacity properties.
